aboutus.title: About
aboutus.paragraph:
Priyanka Sarode, a culinary enthusiast, who by education is an Engineer and Management graduate.

Food Is My Passion.
A passion about food, which showcases itself in her cooking by virtue of her Marathi and most important, Indian roots. A home trained foodie, who majorly learned from her Grandmother and Mother the traditional way of Indian cooking, continuously tries to learn new delicacies of different cultures.
